meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing glass of orangeade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: Orangeade is a popular choice at the summer picnic.
meanings.sent3: The orangeade spilled on the table, creating a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like fizzy orangeade.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly squeezed orangeade filled the room.

meanings.definition: A beverage made from orange juice and water.
meanings.sent1: The kids set up a stand to sell orangeade in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Orangeade is a great alternative to sugary sodas.
meanings.sent3: The orangeade flowed freely at the party, keeping everyone hydrated.
meanings.sent4: His words were as refreshing as a glass of cold orangeade.
meanings.sent5: The orangeade sparkled in the sunlight, tempting passersby.
